Package comp3111.covid.datastorage

Class Database

java.lang.Object
comp3111.covid.datastorage.Database
public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
A class representing the internal database of the system. It contains all the data obtained from the original dataset. Each location read is stored in a HashMap, and each location is represented by a LocationData object. LocationData

    • searchTotalData

      public long searchTotalData​(java.lang.String isoCode, java.time.LocalDate targetDate, DataTitle title)
      A method that searches a data value given the location, date and title of data. The the type of data returned is only restricted to Cumulative COVID cases, Cumulative Covid deaths, and cumulative number of people fully vaccinated. Returns -1 if no data found.
      Parameters:
      isoCode - iso-code of the desired location
      targetDate - the desired date
      title - the desired DataTitle
      Returns:
      the value of data of given location, date and title. Returns -1 if no data found.
      See Also:
      DataTitle

    • searchRateData

      public double searchRateData​(java.lang.String isoCode, java.time.LocalDate targetDate, DataTitle title)
      A method that searches a data value given the location, date and title of data. The the type of data returned is only restricted to COVID cases per 1M people, Cumulative Covid deaths per 1M people, and cumulative vaccination rate. Returns -1 if no data found.
      Parameters:
      isoCode - iso-code of the desired location
      targetDate - the desired date
      title - the desired DataTitle
      Returns:
      the value of data of given location, date and title. Returns -1 if no data found.
      See Also:
      DataTitle

    • searchChartData

      public java.util.ArrayList<javafx.util.Pair<java.time.LocalDate,​java.lang.Number>> searchChartData​(java.lang.String isoCode, java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate, DataTitle title)
      This method returns a list of data point represented by a pair of date and number. The points corresponds are those within the given range of dates, of the given location, and of the given DataTitle. The date range is inclusive of the startDate and the endDate.
      Parameters:
      isoCode - iso-code of the desired location.
      startDate - the starting date of the desired date range.
      endDate - the last date of the desired date range.
      title - the desired DataTitle.
      Returns:
      a list of pairs with the date as x-value and the data value as y-value.
      See Also:
      DataTitle

    • searchDataPair

      public java.util.ArrayList<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Number,​java.lang.Number>> searchDataPair​(java.time.LocalDate targetDate, LocationProperty lp)
      This method returns a list of data points represented by a pair. The x-value of this pair is dictated by the parameter lp a LocationProperty value. The y-value of this pair is always a vaccination rate value. The returned list always contains data of all locations stored in the database.
      Parameters:
      targetDate - the date of interest for the list of data.
      lp - the desired location property.
      Returns:
      a list of data points of all locations of the desired date and location property.

    • clearDatabase

      public void clearDatabase()
      This method clears the all the content of the database.
